  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="4193" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="4193" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.00</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="7700">7,700</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1182"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Individuel</b> by <b>Montblanc</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. <b>Individuel</b> was launched in 2003. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Bourdon. Top notes are Lavender, Cinnamon, Pineapple, Juniper Berries, Mint, Bergamot, Rosemary, Cardamom and Coriander; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Violet, Geranium and Jasmine; base notes are Raspberry, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Dark Chocolate, Musk, Amber, Patchouli, Vetiver and Oakmoss. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages:                             <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">28</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">121</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May be too strong or overpowering for some noses
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">18</span></div>

                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>

                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">125</span></div>

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Can nauseate those who don't like chocolate and fruit scents
                </div>

    </div>

</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="4193"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.29</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="4193"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.12</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> Individuel</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Montblanc/Femme-Individuelle-843.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.843.jpg"alt="Femme Individuelle Montblanc" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Montblanc</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Femme Individuelle</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-Tonic-72719.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.72719.jpg"alt="Individuel Tonic Montblanc" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Montblanc</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Individuel Tonic</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Montblanc/Femme-Individuelle-Soul-Senses-5611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.5611.jpg"alt="Femme Individuelle Soul & Senses Montblanc" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Montblanc</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Femme Individuelle Soul & Senses</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="4193"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="4193"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="4193" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashkan13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashkan13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419">ashkan13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733354757" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not just because I blind bought this but there's way more depth to this than you might think at first. Pierre Bourdon...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2371019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2371019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364672" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YoutubeChannelBobGianShow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="YoutubeChannelBobGianShow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364672ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364672" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031757">YoutubeChannelBobGianShow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 01:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great quality for an affordable price.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 9/10<br />
Projection: 9/10 (surprisingly good!)<br />
Value for Money: 10/10<br />
<br />
Great Job Montblanc Individuel!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2364672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2364672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361753" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="axelcervantesml"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208865"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2208865.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="axelcervantesml" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Banana-Republic/Classic-11683.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11683.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Classic"title="Classic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208865">axelcervantesml</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 06:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like every fabric softener ever. Which isn't a bad thing. Who the heck would even hate that? <br />
<br />
Although I love the scent, I'm sorta shying away from this. I just can't help but to think that the general perception of this is that it smells feminine. Maybe I'll get through it. For now, that's what stopping me from wanting to wear this.<br />
<br />
You can wear this any season. It is sweet enough for cold seasons and fresh enough for warmer seasons. Just don't go heavy during summer because the sweetness will get cloying.<br />
<br />
Update 4 days later: I'm giving this a Love. Anyone can wear this dryer sheet/fabric softener fragrance and no one's gonna judge you for it. Some wearers might not prefer to smell this way, but as long as you don't overspray, no one on Earth would complain over the smell of clothes fresh off the dryer. TIP: I recommend you spray some on your clothes too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2361753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2361753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adesai2s"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209207"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="adesai2s" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfred-Dunhill/Dunhill-Icon-Absolute-36806.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36806.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dunhill Icon Absolute"title="Dunhill Icon Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209207">adesai2s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like fragrance, but a little too sweet and light for my tastes. I prefer Mont Blanc Presence. I think it gets a bit of hype because its far too weak to real perfome as a scent. I keep having to spray 10 times a few times throughout the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2358054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2358054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357352" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashkan13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashkan13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419">ashkan13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm gonna write this to help people blind buy this because most likely a lot of people would have to.<br />
<br />
This is closer to Original Santal than Joop is. However I thought Joop and Individuel are closer to each other than Original Santal and Individuel are to each other. So this is what I thought at first Original Santal------- Individuel---Joop but it may also be closer to Original Santal than it is to Joop. So it might be more like this Original Santal---Individuel------Joop. Because after the very sweet and Joop like opening Individuel turns into a much fresher and also more  complex scent which is less like Joop. I don't think it smells synthetic. To me things like L'eau D'Issey and Cool Water are synthetic not this. I would say that Original Santal smells unusually natural, that's all, it's a 300 euro fragrance. Expect D &amp; G grade quality. Slightly less but I suppose it doesn't have longevity issues that'd &amp; g does. And among these 3, this one is the one that evolves more and is less linear. I wish I could smell the raspberry and chocolate more. This is definitely the rarest of the bunch.<br />
<br />
Things to notice in this, the Cool Water herb combo mint rosemary and lavender, the pineapple use that they credit to Pierre Bourdon for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2357352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2357352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328797">Chrispy83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Daily worthy, dumb reach, inoffensive, but also nice enough and subtle enough for a wedding, or family gathering, surprisingly lasts a while 5 hours ish h till I cant smell it on my neck anymore. It was a gift from my mom one Christmas. Otherwise I would have never smelled it before. Not a total beast mode performer but good for just about any situation year round. Focus choc ras sweet with floral and woody subtleness. But not too sweet. Unique and good value, cheap on the web. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2354381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2354381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not bad! I enjoy the scent profile and the fact that it's inoffensive. A nice pick for the gym, running errands, or just laying around the house. I much prefer Individuel to the old man scent of Presence  7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2352388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2352388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kuvvetmira"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988110"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1988110.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kuvvetmira" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2348091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2348091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328888" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Watermelonsquirt74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2300441"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2300441.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Watermelonsquirt74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4193.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Individuel"title="Individuel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328888ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328888" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2300441">Watermelonsquirt74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this at Ross and Im still blown away. By how amazing this stuff is.<br />
<br />
 This stuff opens up smelling citrusy and fruity but then as it starts to dry down you get a spicy fresh smell with mint, cinnamon, and fruity notes. After about an hour to an hour and a half it starts smelling like fresh linen and vanilla with raspberry. <br />
<br />
Overall this is a great fragrance for all occasions. Got me compliments like crazy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2328888"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2328888#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's okay! Women seem to like it! Wouldn't call it gourmand more a fruity fougere I reckon. It's not a patch on Explorer but it won't be. The world's moved on a bit. If you hate Joop don't blind buy it. I do and did but was pleasantly surprised by it's simplicity in comparison. You may not agree!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2284708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2284708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273571" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SPNKr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1064927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1064927.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SPNKr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); -------------------------------------------------------<br />
Purchased August 2019<br />
Didn't jive with this because I already had and loved Joop! Homme.  Though if you don't have that one and want something a bit more palatable and user friendly, but of course discounted because it's 75 mL what nonsense, then and only then get this instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2273571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2273571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270228" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HamdiNoSimp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239669.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HamdiNoSimp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-55078.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55078.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Eau de Parfum"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270228ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270228" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239669">HamdiNoSimp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my first couple of fragrance purchases right after JPG le male and D&amp;G light blue. Individual takes me back to high school to be honest, I graduated in 2019 if that means anything. Sweet fragrance that gave me plenty of compliments and for me it lasted a couple of hours but some people may find it fades away rather quickly(I only say this because it didn't last long on my brother). You cant go wrong for what its priced at either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2270228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2270228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268501" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The William"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="The William" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/No-1-4648.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4648.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="No. 1"title="No. 1"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104621">The William</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 17:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a hidden gem! It is sweet and fruity, so if that's your thing it's worth a try. Great value, good performance, for me, for an EDT. I wish they'd do an EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2268501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2268501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262984" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kismetyummy(:"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180144"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180144.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kismetyummy(:" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180144">Kismetyummy(:</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 16:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this one for a few days and so far I like it a lot! It smells like cinnamon mixed with a laundry sheet. I don't get a raspberry note in it but thats fine, it still smells great. in most places you can get it pretty cheap as well so for the price it is good. I can't tell how long it lasts for but its at least 5 or 6 hours and it projects pretty well imo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2262984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2262984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261402" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oswanson123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2139536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oswanson123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139536">oswanson123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You've probably smelled this before and don't realize that you have. I feel it to be a common smell amongst middle aged men. It smells laundry fresh, In the same vein as Barber Shop clean. This is the 2003 easy grab &amp; go freshie you can't go wrong with... I wore it to work today just to switch things up. I don't wear this often but I recently went on vacation and I used Creeds Original Santal (belongs to my father) quite a bit and for some reason this DNA is very present in Original Santal and it's a bit smoother. Original SantaI came out after but lets say its Individuel on steroids. If you like the scent profile I would recommend Original Santal over this if you can afford it. I think Individuel is a bit dated &amp; lacks the nuances we see in newer designer releases. For the everyday guy just looking to smell good I still think you can grab this for the cheap and be cool with it. it's simple, fresh and comforting as well as pretty linear---and sometimes I think that's ok. <br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2261402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2261402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coachkeith"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1776106.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coachkeith" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Intense-Man-Parfum-72842.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72842.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Intense Man Parfum"title="Club de Nuit Intense Man Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776106">coachkeith</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is probably one of the most complicated fragrances I own. It's very hard to tie down the notes.<br />
It smells different on skin than it does on paper. I like the way it smells coming off my skin better than when it's on paper.<br />
<br />
I picked this up at Burlington Coat Factory yesterday for $20.00 after regrettably passing up on it a year ago. <br />
Well worth the price. Go get it.  If you don't like it you can gift it to someone who will enjoy wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2259450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2259450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254800" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="staszek998"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2171007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="staszek998" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171007">staszek998</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 22:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very pleasant fragrance and well perceptible in the environment, although not very long lasting. In my opinion, it's too sweet for everyday use (e.g. for work), but perfect for going out with a girlfriend or for a family gathering. I've also never smelled it on anyone else, which is definitely a big plus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2254800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2254800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tristan Maes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1072062.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tristan Maes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072062">Tristan Maes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple, fresh, and super inoffensive. It kinda reminds me of playing outside as a kid and walking past the vent for the laundry room. <br />
<br />
If you just want something that literally smells like an expensive brand fabric softener, this is it. This is also one of the safest work scents you could possibly wear, especially if you are like me and work with patients. It's very versatile and can be worn almost all year round however I would advice against wearing this in high heat (80 degrees or more)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2254720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2254720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LostSock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1500461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LostSock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-pour-Homme-2003-691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"title="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461">LostSock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 23:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing how many people in the comments think this is a clone of Original Santal when this came out two years prior, and both were made by Bourdon although Creed try to hide that fact.<br />
<br />
Creed cloned this, not the other way round - Mont Blanc got their revenge by making Explorer, a clone of Aventus. Educate yourselves a little bit if you're spending so much on a hobby and making false comments that make you look like a sausage. When two scents smell very similar, the expensive one isn't always the original.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2231528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2231528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kaman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kaman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cosmic-Pepper-81804.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81804.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cosmic Pepper"title="Cosmic Pepper"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194758">Kaman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a load of freshly washed laundry. I dont find myself reaching for this fragrance because it reminds me of a less impressive Prada LHomme, which I wear instead. I do however use Individual as a room scent for my closet. Smells good, but I recommended spending the extra money on Prada LHomme.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2221695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2221695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SStephanjx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723119"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723119.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SStephanjx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723119">SStephanjx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 06:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Original Santal came two years after this one, and both were created by Pierre Bourdon.  That being said, I can picture Creed hiring him, stating that the liked what he did with Individuel, and gave him the leeway to create a similar fragrance with better ingredients, because it is that.  I'm wearing Original Santal today, but I have Individuel on my right hand, and Original Santal on my left.  They do smell VERY similar, but Indiividuel is a little bit lighter, a bit airy where Original Santal is a bit more herbaceous, deeper, and more resinous.  To me, they are both good fragrances.  Who is to say there isn't room to enjoy both of Pierre Bourdon's creations?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2219112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2219112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215884" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RC59888"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RC59888" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191992">RC59888</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 20:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It was super fresh in the opening and smelled unique after drying down. However, it is not very good to use in summer or high-heat weather. The longevity and projection are okay; it can still be smelled after 4 hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2215884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2215884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2206772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2206772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197024" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LooneyLex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2153310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2153310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LooneyLex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/First-Instinct-37753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="First Instinct"title="First Instinct"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2153310">LooneyLex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a manly (yet not overcompensatingly so) dryer sheet. Nice fresh, sweet linen with a sexy dry down. For how cheap it is theres nothing to really complain about. The vanilla and the raspberry dont really appear once its dried down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2197024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2197024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188976" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Valiantly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138571"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2138571.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Valiantly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138571">Valiantly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Individuel is a twenty dollar EDT that performs like an extrait, if you are looking for sillage/longevity in your cheapie then look no further.<br />
<br />
The comparisons to laundry and dryer sheets are spot on because that is exactly what this fragrance smells like and its not a bad thing. Its not a sexy scent but its definitely worth adding to your fresh collection because of the price point and performance. I love when a cheap fragrance surprises like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2188976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2188976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180331" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nitelight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nitelight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108223">nitelight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking for something along the lines of Dove Clean Comfort and bought this based on reviews.I don't get sweet or raspberry at all and not even close to dark chocolate,all I get is synthetic aroma that has a hint of that Joop scent (not as quite as acrid as Joop). I do get the 'dyer sheet' comment but it's not that long lasting and it doesn't last on skin. <br />
I left it sitting for a few months and seems to have developed a hint of depth but to be honest I regret buying this one since its just so chemical. There's dupe Joop fragrances ( m&amp;s sandalwood and tobacco) that have similar notes but smell nicer. Joop Ice (now discounted) also has the same dryer sheet smell and outperforms this hands down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2180331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2180331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I hate freshies, so feel free to stop reading now if you like them.  This smells like Irish Spring soap with some hints of Joop! Homme. I thought it would be an office safe fragrance but it just makes me wish I was wearing something else any time I've put it on. It's not objectively bad, just totally not my style.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2160203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2160203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrAnderson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrAnderson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207639">MrAnderson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean/Sandalwood/Fabric-Softer with a hint of sweetness from the raspberry. Not as sweet as some people saying. Shore a bit synthetic but not more than other designers imo. Actually I think modern ambroxan  based scents smells more synthetic than this. Dont get confused by the long list of ingredients. Most fragrances has this amount of ingredients but its not officialy listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2148126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2148126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
