One of my favourite sweet fresh summer frag. Highly recommend.<br />
<br />
My rate 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2144292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2144292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141808" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dipietro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dipietro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Pour-Monsieur-615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pour Monsieur"title="Pour Monsieur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247133">Dipietro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not sure if there is a perfect " Gym Fragrance" but this is probably as close as it gets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2141808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2141808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like masculine scented dryer sheets . It is definitely synthetic and really just a clean scent. It is a perfect office scent . I don't want to say it's a boring fragrance but it's doesn't lean in any way that gives it that bang. My biggest issue is that it does have a slight odd note that throws it off. I think it's the juniper and patchouli.  It does get better the longer it's on., but that odd smell is part of the base. This can be worn just about whenever , super versatile. While not exact in anyway this reminds me of Prada L'Homme and bad boy Parfum . This starts slightly fruity and sweet with the powder and lavender notes grounding a lot of the brighter notes . It has the fruity sweet dryer sheets smell that turns into an aromatic dryer sheet smell with the hint of raspberry. Performance isn't bad. I have been applying  6-7 sprays , projecting for a good 3 hours.  It stays on the skin for a good 6 hours before it almost fades away . The bottle is pretty nice and sleek with an ok atomizer. I have worn this 4 times already and chances are I won't wear this again. The weirdness killed it for me to wear as a fragrance. I really tried to like it. But I have no problem using this as a quick room spray . <br />
Scent - 5.5<br />
Performance - 7.0<br />
Bottle 7.0</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2137844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2137844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Individuel was released in 2003 and Original Santal was released in 2005. Original Santal was a dupe of Individuel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2132502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2132502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132453" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nemesisdrummer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nemesisdrummer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Virgin-Island-Water-899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Virgin Island Water"title="Virgin Island Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010070">nemesisdrummer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This juice is great value for money. Perfect for a summers night. This is heavily influenced by Original Santal by Creed and is a very well made dupe that has been created with good quality ingredients. One of the best "Value" frags I have ever purchased and I would buy it again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2132453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2132453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131607" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291349.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01"title="Molecule 01"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); But it's smell nice and can't go wrong with this one. My Brother said it smells like joop Homme and i must kinda agree, but this one is better. The drydown is somewhat similiar to le male</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2128291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2128291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127891" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EbagAppez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EbagAppez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3747.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million"title="1 Million"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919507">EbagAppez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 18:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this one today as my office choice. Even after all if these years, it is still one of my top office safe choices for fall, winter, and early spring. It's not for everyone, but you can't go wrong with the sweet dryer sheet smell when playing it safe at the office.<br />
<br />
For the price it's also a really good value due to it being a solid 8 hour performer, and a a modest sillage trail and projection for about an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2127891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2127891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124399" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NevesR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1692050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1692050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NevesR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Captain-Fawcett-s/Booze-and-Baccy-45848.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45848.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Booze and Baccy"title="Booze and Baccy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124399ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124399" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1692050">NevesR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I use this as an air freshener and it smells amazing. I can see the appeal but it's not my jam, either way it's a great cheapie and deserves the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2124399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2124399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="herbertjuergen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="herbertjuergen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-l-Homme-5521.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5521.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de l'Homme"title="La Nuit de l'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069904">herbertjuergen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 23:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually liked the opening of this fragrance.<br />
But the drydown smells very synthetic sweet that I couldn't stand it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2123194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2123194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="root"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1136692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1136692.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="root" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1136692">root</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 17:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my dumb reach for fall, thought it would be also great during winter and early spring as well. It would be too cloying for the summer. <br />
It's highly synthetic yet smells beautiful. Sharp frozen raspberries, or cold, breezy raspberry drier sheet - if I had to describe it, and dries down as a powdery smell. It pops up every now and then and surprises you when you catch a whiff hours after applying it. That's the phase I love the most. It's very easy to overspray, but only two-three sprays max is enough, more than that and you might get a headache. I own around 6 bottles of this and always looking for more in case this gets discontinued. <br />
<br />
In terms of audience, I think it's good for any age group. Suited up or dressed down casual. Night out in the town, fancy dressed up dinner, weddings..all good. INCREDIBLY versatile. I would suggest going easy on the sprayer and not judging the cologne based on the synthetic, headache-inducing rubbing alcohol type of opening. Wait until the smell develops. On skin it's great, on clothes it lingers for days. <br />
Based on the reviews here it seems like this is a polarizing scent..you either love it or hate it..so try first I guess. <br />
This was a blind buy for me, but was totally worth it. This and Mont Black Starwalker..instant like.<br />
<br />
Scent - 9<br />
Longevity - 8<br />
Sillage - 7<br />
Value - 9</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2119720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2119720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115969" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tfceccherini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tfceccherini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4193.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Individuel"title="Individuel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115969ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115969" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517007">Tfceccherini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-06">04/06/24 03:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spraying top notes: I sense it intensively aromatic with fresh spicy, warm scents of lavender and cardamon. I also identify a slight citric smell - bergamot and citric notes. As time passed by, it became predominantly fruity and fresh transitioning to spicy notes.<br />
<br />
At the heart, it became overwhelmingly floral and clean. Yet so, noticeable fruity/berry fragrances. I couldn't identify any trace of woody notes. Maybe slightly, indistinguishable from floral and fruity scents. At best I do not have the sensitivity to feel them.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, I hold that Montblanc Individuel is a very discrete, low-profile and intimate fragrance (low sillage). It is wearable in the spring and fall day-light seasons, considering how fruity and floral it is. It fits perfectly at work, given its intimacy and freshness. However, it is a very particular fragrance, which means that you might like it or hate it (I like it, my wife don't).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2115969"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2115969#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Justin Taylor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Justin Taylor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Eau-de-Parfum-62762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Eau de Parfum"title="Eros Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930929">Justin Taylor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ditto cynogriffin. Gave it away to my niece's boyfriend. Meh...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2110819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2110819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109133" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Modock878"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Modock878" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465318">Modock878</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells amazing! Like an Updated version of Joop   ..I Hate that it's been discontinued.  I'm pissed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2109133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2109133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098407" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cynogriffin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038695"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cynogriffin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Original-Penguin/Premium-Blend-38898.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38898.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Premium Blend"title="Premium Blend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038695">cynogriffin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought since it was cheap, and I would say that this is not really a safe blind buy. The first time I wore this, I absolutely hated it. All I could smell is dryer sheet, because it does in fact smell like a straight up dryer sheet fresh out the box. It's not necessarily a bad smell, since it's essentially a clean laundry smell, but not really attractive to my tastes, as it was overly powdery and fresh linen smell. Maybe even a bit like fabreeze? If you want to make sure everyone knows that your shirt is clean because you just pulled it out of the dryer, this is the stuff for you.<br />
<br />
Once I tried it a couple more times, I was able to look past the dryer sheet smell and pick up some of the other notes, although I think there are waaaay too many notes given and it's really a pretty simple scent. On the dry down, you definitely get the sweeter raspberry smell as well as some vanilla and chocolate. A slight hint of amber and musk (very slight) gives it some masculinity. There are some florals there, mainly I would say lavender lending to the laundry smell, and maybe some sandalwood, but I wouldn't call this a woody fragrance by any means. Performance is decent, but not anything to write home about. Once again, not a safe blind buy in my opinion, as the powdery linen smell is not for everyone, but I do think this is a good one for if you want a generic, non-citrus, fresh fragrance for the daytime or maybe bedtime.<br />
<br />
Personally, I would give it probably an honest, right down the middle 5/10, as I could take it or leave it. It's not great, but it's not necessarily bad. I won't be buying another bottle because it's not really to my tastes, but it is kind of a unique smell amongst freshies, since it lacks the citrus and aquatic notes that are so common. If smelling like a dryer sheet placed on top of a slice of raspberry cheesecake sounds interesting to you, maybe pick it up to try since it is cheap and intriguing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2098407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2098407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dan_non"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1925614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dan_non" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1925614">dan_non</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty decent fragrance for 20 quid <br />
Opening notes arnt very impressive and are overly complex but this fragrance stands out in the drydown where you get a really nice smell of sweet vanilla, raspberry (vaguely) and dark chocolate. Not overly boastful or impressive, more subtle. It's great for a blind buy at such a cheap price but the price comes through with it's weaker longevity and silliage, pretty good for a beginner but again not up there in fragrances. I would however still very much recommend this as it's cheap, smells good, and has a nice bottle with a satisfying (heavy) lid. 6/10 the kinda thing you wear as a basic everyday one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2094843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2094843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051985">skeed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>got this for around 25 dollars, and im very happy with my purchase. This is very fresh and clean, any season, any time of day fragrance. Powdery, semi sweet, with some spice. Its bold but isn't going to gas out a room, very wearable to the office or anywhere really. This is a fragrance i would recommend to someone who doesn't wear fragrances but wants to try one. I don't pick up on the soapy aspect that a lot are picking up on, i think probably just attribute that to freshness. this is a pretty safe blind buy in my opinion if you can get it below 30 dollars.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084213" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonnu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018160"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2018160.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonnu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018160">tonnu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like handsoap</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jojohanhan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034742"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2034742.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jojohanhan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034742">jojohanhan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 04:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens in a fresh lavender note, like a newly washed and dryed bedsheet. Then progress into powdery floral smell in the middle. Sweet raspberry maintaining presence all round from opening, mid and base but come as main character in base note with slight gourmand vanilla. Good projection and longevity at about 6-8 hours. My wife loves the sweet gourmand base note that sit close to the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2080707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2080707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060494" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Travis_Bickle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Travis_Bickle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818538">Travis_Bickle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think I got this for around $20 off a discounter. Fresh and fruity with a slight powder. It actually reminds me of the Yardley Gentleman talc powder I use in the morning. The scents pair very well together. Longevity leaves a little to be desired as it is an EDT, but for it's price I can only recommend this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2060494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2060494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052785" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohammedakm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohammedakm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661132">mohammedakm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 07:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel it has that gentleman while wearing a suit smell.<br />
A great blind buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2052785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2052785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2052340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2052340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Delrio37"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651179"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Delrio37" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651179">Delrio37</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 07:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one was pleasant when it was below 50F outside and cloying when it was warmer than that. I view this one as a wintertime specialist that can work on cooler fall days as well. Since the sweetness can be headache-inducing, I didn't find it to be a good office scent. <br />
<br />
It is an extremely synthetic scent, but, as a result, you get excellent longevity for the price. The longevity &amp; value for money are both impressive, but neither offsets the fact that this is simply too sweet for my liking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2043507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2043507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
