Good for office, but the thing i can specifically say about this one, its pleasant smelling but not sexy at all. Thats the best description.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2040876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2040876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040038" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, mass appealing, youthful. I picked up on a black pepper note that's somewhat unique within this genre, though overall nothing groundbreaking here.<br />
<br />
Performance is relatively poor. Does not project much and completely vanishes after a few hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2040038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2040038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035086" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DeWitt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1087535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1087535.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DeWitt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1087535">DeWitt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This used to be my signature fragrance for almost 3 years, during high school, and I used to love it.<br />
<br />
So, I recently felt nostalgic and ended up ordering a bottle, so I could relive some of my fondest memories from that time. But I just felt disappointed.<br />
<br />
I don't know whether it got a botched reformulation since then, or if my skin chemistry changed, because after about 30 minutes it starts smelling like cooking oil on me.<br />
<br />
I never had this happen on a perfume before. Had to be in what used to be one of my favorite scents ever...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2035086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2035086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragrantJosh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragrantJosh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640845">FragrantJosh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have worn this fragrance 3 times so far and everytime draws me in more and more it's so interesting, it's sweet but not bubblegum sweet, it's clean and soapy, Individuel is how everyone describes it it's almost just like a fabric conditioner with a very light hint of raspberry, don't go buying this one to expect to smell a bunch of fruity raspberry because that's not the case. A few times I have caught a bitter smell possibly from the dark chocolate but unfortunately it's extremely subtle. The vanilla and amber works lovely in the dry down adding a slightly smooth warming touch. I am getting Joop Homme in soon and I will compare these two although I have smelt Joop Homme before and it was way sweeter possibly from the honey note. I get around 5-6 hours of longevity with a light projection, I think I turn nose blind rather quickly to this fragrance but it's not meant to be ultra strong and beast mode. <br />
<br />
Longevity 5-6hrs<br />
Price 8.5/10<br />
Scent 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2033869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2033869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2031019" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinnaminominameenomomin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958788"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958788.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinnaminominameenomomin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2031019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2031019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958788">Cinnaminominameenomomin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has grown on me a lot as it was one of the first-ever full bottles I own and at first, I thought it was too cloying, however, this has grown on me. I used to get a bunch of different smells and I felt mixed about owning it, but now I get this raspberry detergent smell that kind of smells like you are walking down the laundry product aisle and there's one that smells pretty dang fruity. It is not bad by any means, but it's not something I would wear always which is why I've leaned more to wear this at the gym versus out during class or work. <br />
<br />
All in all, not a bad fragrance but definitely wouldn't be something I would wear going out. <br />
<br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2031019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2031019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027182" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="L1ghtlyS4lted"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1148662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1148662.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="L1ghtlyS4lted" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1148662">L1ghtlyS4lted</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 20:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can't decide how I feel about this one. I think on my skin the notes kind of blend together into that bounce dryer sheet smell rather than having a separate "dryer sheet accord" (lol), because when I sniff it looking for the raspberry/vanilla/chocolate/etc the notes are definitely there, but when I just happen to catch a whiff of it while I'm out just pure dryer sheet. Smelling like that definitely isn't a bad thing (I don't think anyone minds smelling clean) but it's not really what I was looking for. Blind buy but only out $20 so nbd. I definitely feel like it's worth that 20 in a vacuum but had I been able to test it first I probably would have spent it on something else, definitely not a bad scent at all though IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2027182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2027182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023043" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="goomi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723699"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="goomi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723699">goomi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 20:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad, got this at Ross for around $25. It's a very pleasant versatile fragrance that smells like raspberries and fabric softener. Gets a surprising amount of compliments, would recommend for the price. Nothing mind-blowing, but very clean and versatile, with decent performance for a good price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2023043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2023043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017356" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NorthByNorthEast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1865024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NorthByNorthEast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/JF-9900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="JF"title="JF"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865024">NorthByNorthEast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 19:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a nice clean fragrance. Opens sweet and raspberry, almost a Twizzler note, and of course the soapy "fabric softener" accord. Would work well in the summer on hot days to keep laundry fresh. Later on the sandalwood hovers below the surface.<br />
<br />
It's a bit too sweet for me, but for 30 bucks it's a good addition to the collection for something different. If I paid Original Santal prices for it, it might be a different reaction.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2017356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2017356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015659" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C Schmoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950911"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950911.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="C Schmoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-for-Men-Eau-de-Parfum-31909.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31909.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"title="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950911">C Schmoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 19:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't hate it, but it isn't going to be in my rotation much, if at all. There are far better fragrances from the house of Montblanc, but don't get me wrong this doesn't smell bad at all. If you can find it for the right price then I'd say go for it, but if you're willing to spend a little more then I'd recommend a variety of other fragrances.<br />
<br />
Scent - 7.3<br />
Longevity - 7.9<br />
Sillage - 8.0<br />
Value - 9.2</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2015659"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2015659#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012864" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jinjayagi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jinjayagi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945761">jinjayagi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am young so it doesn't appeal as much to me. However, the scent feels like if it's on your clothes, you are wearing the cleanest damn clothing you ever will wear. This feels like a go-to for any kind of formal occasion. It reminds me that aside from wearing scents that are sweet and attractive, we also need to be prepared for formal occasions where opinions of older men matter, and impressions on older women also matter.<br />
<br />
It's beautiful. I may use this a lot more when I'm in my later 20's, attending meetings with managers and staff in suits. On top of this, it is well-priced for its mature scent and I feel like your money is being spent on luxury for a modest amount. This is the most humble and serious scent I've picked up as a gift.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2012864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2012864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012704" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TrashBoat0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1909255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TrashBoat0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ramz-Lattafa-Silver-71868.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71868.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ramz Lattafa Silver"title="Ramz Lattafa Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909255">TrashBoat0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's everything everyone says it is -- fresh laundry ---  office safe --- etc etc.  But, it's just too soapy for me.  I can't do it.  The fresh/sweet smell is overpowered by the strong soapy/dryer sheet scent.  Bought it at TJ Maxx/Marshalls; gonna try to return it.<br />
Update:  7 months later its long since been returned. It had this overwhelmingly synthetic dryer sheet/musky vibe.  There's enough frags out there to try; you can skip this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2012704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2012704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MiiiL33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1654692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1654692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MiiiL33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tuscan-Leather-1849.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1849.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tuscan Leather"title="Tuscan Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1654692">MiiiL33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just love Montblanc Individuel. I have hyperfocus with Raspberry things so I couldn't pass on this. I usually spray a touch or two on the cap so I can smell it before I apply it on my skin. The opening is a metallic kind of sweetness, in a fresh, juicy way of sweetness. I think that might be the pineapple note. After about 15 minutes on my skin, it turns into a fruity and chocolatey scent, I think that the raspberry, vanilla and chocolate notes comes up at this point, this is my favorite point in every single perfume I've tried on my skin. It doesn't turn into a more interesting thing after that, but I think that my raspberry hyperfocus makes me feel that this is my favorite scent of all times! I can wear it for every ocassion, from a casual day hanging out with friends, to a more formal event. Overall, it smells like clean clothes, so it makes this perfume a perfect choice for my signature scent </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2006128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2006128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001625" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001625" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Junaid666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1833473.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Junaid666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Zino-Davidoff-590.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.590.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zino Davidoff"title="Zino Davidoff"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001625ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001625" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833473">Junaid666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 22:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A really great clean fragrance. Normally clean fragrances are associated with "blues" which feature citruses of some kind, but not Individuel. This one takes a different approach and nails it. The raspberry note is the key player here, however its blended with other notes in such a way that it smells like washed, clean clothes? <br />
The people who are saying it smells synthetic are not wrong, but remember you're paying around $20 for this. Its totally worth it to add to your collection for a dumb reach fragrance. Works almost year round and gets the job done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="2001625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=2001625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998526" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmoothieOperator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmoothieOperator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905905">SmoothieOperator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>- Nice break from standard "blue" freshies, veers into more of a magenta, berry, detergent smell.<br />
<br />
- I would actually love a pure, long lasting laundry detergent smell, but this tries to "masculinize" that smell and ends up a bit gross. Apparently the only way to make berry detergent manly is to make it smell slightly unpleasant.<br />
<br />
- Lacks the edge of complexity to be addictive. <br />
<br />
- Desperately needs some kind of fizzy or tart kick, zing, edge. The main scent is more worthy of being an afterscent. Nothing "happens", very linear.<br />
<br />
- I stop smelling it within minutes of spraying, but it can't be that weak, so I attribute this more to the type of smell. The simple "manly berry"  scent  just becomes part of the air.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1998526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1998526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985601" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Takamojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Takamojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288">Takamojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 05:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested for a month:<br />
<br />
I have two perspectives on Individuel. First,  I think for a $15 - $24 price tag, it's great and smells better than most people around you throughout the day. Especially when most men in the US only wear a fragrance for special occasions.   It lasts a full work day even with heavy perspiration. <br />
<br />
The second perspective is,  "how much are you willing to pay to smell good for yourself?" I think everyone should wear fragrances for themselves, not others.  If you want a good smelling fragrance, buy one you love, not cause it's inexpensive. <br />
<br />
Anyway, the scent opens with old school sharpness like white peppery mint notes if that makes sense.  But the middle and dry down are sweet. Take joop homme tone down with a hint of vanilla and light powdery musk in the back. It leaves a noticeable scent trail in office settings and if you're trying to be discovered this could work in highly active or professional settings. You'll know if it's for you after your first full wear. I would recommend you definitely try it. <br />
<br />
Scent: 2/10<br />
Performance: 6/10<br />
Value: 10/10<br />
Overall: 18/30</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1985601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1985601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985280" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maianese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maianese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); <br />
I like it, but rarely go for it as there is always a better alternative.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1985280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1985280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981642" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy_Bandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1773052.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy_Bandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lorenzo-Villoresi/Musk-5090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musk"title="Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); Generic and common cold season scent. Gets boring really quick <br />

align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1978483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1978483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coonhound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coonhound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689">coonhound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 22:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Pass - Citrusy.  Powdery.  Uneventful.  It smells like Axe Body Wash but a little softer and little more lemon<br />
<br />
1 Hour Later - This is still a very clean scent.  It is powdery, but not on the order of Burberry Touch.  Less like a clean diaper and more like a flushable cleaning wipe<br />
<br />
Powdery scents for men confuse me because they are so feminine.  This one attempts to counteract that by amping up the citrus<br />
<br />
Not my style<br />
<br />
***Scents, like tastes, are subjective. Wear what you like***</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1967326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1967326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1961329" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1961329" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RelaxItsTax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1799675.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="RelaxItsTax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Halston/Catalyst-for-Men-3691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Catalyst for Men"title="Catalyst for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1961329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1961329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799675">RelaxItsTax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-26">10/26/23 06:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>George the Fragrance apprentice on youtube put it best. A Harsh young and obnoxious Joop Homme getting arrested and sent to Juvenile Hall. Doing its bid and then sent to boarding school. Turning its life around, graduated from University, and finally finding himself becoming the more pleasant, mature "INDIVIDUEL" and productive member of society he is today.  Great office scent. Non offensive in my book. There are people saying that it smells like fabric softener but I don't know how that could possibly be a bad thing. Its a great workday dumb reach in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1961329"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1961329#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1956717" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sab1nx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1651454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sab1nx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1956717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1956717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651454">sab1nx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-20">10/20/23 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, it smells like body odor. Sold my bottle instantly.<br />
<br />
Scent: 1/7<br />
Projection: 3/7<br />
Longevity: 3/7<br />
Overall: No, thx</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1956717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1956717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anomaly26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860012.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anomaly26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860012">anomaly26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Montblanc Individuel is an interesting fragrance. It opens with a pleasant burst of fruity and slightly sweet notes, which is inviting and subtle. As it settles, it unveils a mix of florals and spices, giving it a bit more complexity.<br />
The scent is versatile and can suit various occasions, making it a solid choice for everyday wear. However, I found that the longevity was moderate, not exceptionally long-lasting. The bottle design is classic and understated, which aligns with the overall vibe of the fragrance.<br />
Overall, Montblanc Individuel is a decent fragrance if you're looking for something adaptable and easy to wear, though it might not stand out as a bold statement scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1949994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1949994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943249" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VecentMourner1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VecentMourner1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842281">VecentMourner1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a warm dryer sheet, but in the best way possible. Slightly sweet, very clean smelling, not great projection on my skin, but for the price this is a very good starter scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1943249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1943249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938365" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If anyone has used the Doce men Clean Comfort shower gel, this smells exactly like that imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1938365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1938365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1936215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1845584">youngevans</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Mont Blanc Individuel by hype and I ordered it without smelling it prior. And damn what a wasteful experience. The fragrance smelled so cheap and it had no projection whatsoever. You'll have to smell the spot on your body where you sprayed it to smell it. (Damn) <br />
<br />
You can spray the perfume in a room and when one enters, they can barely smell it. I'm not sure if I had a fake bottle or the real one because of the hype and how bad it is</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1936215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1936215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1934586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Im not a huge fan of sweet fragrances but I like this a lot, actually. Got it for $25 50ml and it was extremely worth it.<br />
A woman could pull this off, but i feel it still leans more masculine.<br />
Fruity floral, No regrets at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1934586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1934586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1931242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1931242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nirvblakr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766190"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1766190.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nirvblakr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Silver-Birch-Lavender-Cologne-59427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne"title="Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1931242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1931242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766190">nirvblakr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 15:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was curious with this relatively affordable Montblanc variant. Might as well give it a try today.<br />
Opening is fruity and floral. I wouldn't say that this is a male perfume. Smells fresh on the first 5mins but it goes to more floral after. The lavander scent is strong. It's bordering more for women.... mature women. I remember the scent when I was young when aunts and grandmas were kissing me. You smell the plethora of powder, lipstick, makeup, perfume, etc. That's the smell of the drydown. Violet and powdery. I was surprised with the absence of the iris lipsticky note. <br />
I can't wear this the whole day. I like Montblanc's Legend Spirit and Explorer but I have to pass on this. Good thing I just had a sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1931242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1931242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chridela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950165"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.950165.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chridela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Dans-Tes-Bras-3976.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3976.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dans Tes Bras"title="Dans Tes Bras"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950165">chridela</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To my annoyance, fragrances are usually marketed to males or females.  Rarely as unisex.  This scent could easily marketed as unisex.  For optimal effect, less is more - can be harsh if over-applied.  Smells like a dryer sheet in a good way.  I wear Creed Original Santal occasionally  - Individuel compares favorably except it is a little more synthetic. Overall, it's  a decent cheapie which is definitely worth owning, especially at the price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1930154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1930154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1925356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1925356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="the_Scentsei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1411891.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="the_Scentsei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411891">the_Scentsei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-28">08/28/23 05:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow this is a perfect example of the evolution of ones sense of smell. It's development is totally beyond our control...<br />
<br />
I used to love this one! LOVE it. It's friendly, safe, and non-offensive from afar. Heck I even liked it up close. Bought backups and everything.<br />
<br />
Then about oh honestly 2-3 months ago I put it in and was like "whoa what is this synthetic bomb?!" but it was tolerable...<br />
Then oh I tried it again a week and a half ago. It smelled just AWFUL. I have since have away the backups. I still have a og bottle I'm my collection but I honestly think I'll let it go as well. It went from me rocking it to it being <br />
<br />
Final Sniffs=<br />
1/10: This stuff is a headache inducing synthetic mess!<br />
Cautionary tale<br />
Be careful about loading up in cheapies. One day they may suddenly be absolutely atrocious to a changed olfactory system...<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1913354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1913354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913113" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jordysmellsgud"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258946"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jordysmellsgud" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jimmy-Choo/Jimmy-Choo-Man-Blue-49723.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49723.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jimmy Choo Man Blue"title="Jimmy Choo Man Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); It's woody, bourbon, alcohol-y, powdery, spicy, I really don't like it at all. It's become a bathroom air freshener. I'm kind of surprised It's rated 4/5. I'd rate it a 2/5. Generic and not Seductive like it trys to be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1913113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1913113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
