padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721021">Shehran303</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my humble opinion -- this S<br />
Smells unequivocally like fabric softener, dead on. It smells very cheap and synthetic and carries the same scent all throughout the time. Fabric softener smells good on washed clothes as a mild scent, but as a fragrance it's too potent for my nose and has been giving me headaches. I get no sandalwood at all like some YouTubers claim.This is my 2nd MB fragrance and I had high hopes for this too as the Legend EDP was simply a masterpiece.  I'd give this 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1908810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1908810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YourWan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="YourWan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eternal-Oud-78155.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78155.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternal Oud"title="Eternal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255552">YourWan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-07">08/07/23 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice for a change Clean Fruity Linen Cheeky Sunny Summer feel but would be too sweet in the Sun White shirt in a cooler summer evening But I don't wear white shirts... If I was to pick the most synthetic scent i have this would be it... Much more interesting out there, but this is fair for what it does... I find i now wear Galloway Parfums de Marly where I would have had an option to wear this and Galloway is way better in heat too... Big difference in price... but think once you expand your collection you won't look back at this often...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1896328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1896328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1893214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1893214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ed_Lanz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754585"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1754585.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ed_Lanz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1893214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1893214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754585">Ed_Lanz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-03">08/03/23 07:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fruity, fresh and slightly sweet fragrance. This is the kind of fragrance you can wear when you want something that doesnt draw too much attention but it is still noticeable and pleasant. It has a high similarity to the smell of fresh clean linens, but in a better way, so its the kind of fragrance that will give you a clean vibe without trying too hard, perfect for the office or a very casual reunion. The note of raspberry is the most prominent, then the lavender, at least to my nose. Great versatility but I would avoid it when the weather is too hot. I get 10-12 hours duration on my skin, and 24+ hours on clothes, with good projection on the first 1-2 hours. I recommend it if you are looking for an affordable soap-like fragrance to get you feeling clean, versatile enough but perhaps not so much for very hot weather. <br />
<br />
Scent: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10<br />
Bottle: 7/10<br />
Value for money: 10/10<br />
Overall: 7.6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1893214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1893214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you're expecting something mind blowing go buy top noch niche fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1892811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1892811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974">Steve907</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-02">08/02/23 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like an unused dryer sheet  A severely overhyped unused dryer sheet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1892740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1892740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1890466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1890466" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1890466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1890466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-30">07/30/23 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Complex synthesis. Like a super nuanced lavender. Deep and somewhat dense. Smells like Eau de Laundry Pod, but not in a bad way. This is a dressed up cheapie. If you like laundry type fragrances, you should have this in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1890466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1890466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1883783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1883783" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brutu$"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797524"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brutu$" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1883783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1883783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797524">Brutu$</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-21">07/21/23 10:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very cheap, synthetic smell. It can be used only as car fragrance, not for men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1883783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1883783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880798" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Texas2021"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Texas2021" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326116">Texas2021</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an excellent scent for the gym. Because of its often compared similarities to fabric softener it enables someone to wear a scent that has nice sillage without appearing to try too hard by wearing a more distinctive fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1880798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1880798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880791" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Paco-Rabanne-Pour-Homme-526.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.526.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"title="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223623">Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pierre Bourdon created a classy and perfect scent for teenagers, and that takes talent. Those still treasuring some youthful spirit can't help but like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1880791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1880791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880170" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="razorsedge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="razorsedge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247086">razorsedge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an odd fragrance. First sprays I couldn't smell it on me at all, very slight "Clean sheets" kind of smell when burying my nose on the skin, but SO said it's "good". I was kind of disappointed thinking I got a dud and performance was awful. Gave it a few more "warning" sprays in the air and let it sit for a night.<br />
<br />
It matured and showed it's colours in full brightness just overnight. It's a very clean smelling, fresh laundry like smell, with strong raspberry note. A clean-sweet combo of two. "Clean fresh laundry" note, which I award to Lavender, starts slightly chemically, like a laundry detergent, but not as bad as some people described. It settles down fast to powdery clean smell. Equally strong is the Raspberry note - those two are the main notes here. It's potent but inoffensive. Smooth powderiness of White Florals ties it all together, making for a pleasant smelling, inoffensive but good-performing fragrance. Sinking my nose into skin I get a hint of Vanilla, and a bit of Mint, but none of the other listed notes.<br />
<br />
I definitely get the Joop! resemblance - it smells like a less potent and cloyingly sweet, but more fresh, mature, and office friendly version of it. Performance is similarly strong - it projects "average" for a couple of hours, and the sits close to skin for the rest of the day. Even after shower I can clearly smell it on my skin - it has some staying power!<br />
<br />
Like the aforementioned Joop!, this does smell a bit out of fashion, but is a good fragrance overall. Definitely an easy and flexible wear. I'd pick it over Joop! as well. 50/50 for a blind buy - I'd lean towards safe but if you're unsure about if you like sweet fragrances, probably should sample it first.<br />
<br />
Also love the tin bottle - saves so much space!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1880170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1880170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1879373" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jjjooonnn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1785646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1785646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jjjooonnn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1879373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1879373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1785646">jjjooonnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-15">07/15/23 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wish this was cheaper and that my clothes smell like it all the time. The Powdery Raspberry is special. Can't go too heavy on this or it turns kinda feminine on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1879373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1879373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="michaelwblevins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="michaelwblevins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741116">michaelwblevins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 21:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So i have mixed feelings on this guy. The opening is good for me with Raspberry and smells like clean linens. However, the dry down to me reminds of staying in a red roof inn. The hallways smelled of that generic laundry all the time and i couldnt get that out of my mind</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1869207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1869207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1867047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1867047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentologist11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentologist11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Pour-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-59987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum"title="Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1867047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1867047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560706">Scentologist11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-29">06/29/23 02:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There simply comes a day some times in month-when i just feel a big NO for all very expensive finesse and heavy complex scents - That's when I apply this simple and cheap beauty...<br />
<br />
Mont Blanc Individuel - Sweet and sour raspberry with many additives - the smell is simple and at the same time beautiful - there are no three-dimensional pictures and broad multi-layered representations... It just smells nice, clean, formal and ok!<br />
<br />
And the bottle is soo cute!<br />
<br />
You probably have a day like that yourself, but you get the point :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1867047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1867047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1858807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1858807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweetboy05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1702817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweetboy05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dumont/Nitro-Red-73023.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73023.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nitro Red"title="Nitro Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1858807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1858807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817">Sweetboy05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-17">06/17/23 20:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@SenslessReviews    What a story. Quite entertaining!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1858807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1858807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1856345" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaurg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1117052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaurg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1856345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1856345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1117052">kaurg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-14">06/14/23 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impressions. I have no problem with funky smells and I'm quite fond of animalic musks and all sorts of intrigues, but this one initially almost made me gag. The reason for it seems to be an overdose of a certain laundry musk. It's a clean musk, but comes with an overbearingly mineral chlorine note that smells like something straight from a chemist's lab. Underneath that, a cloyingly sweet, yet strangely flat pineapple smell. I get no raspberry, but there is some mint. It's vaguely similar to other Montblanc fragrances with the Aventus/Fierce-inspired pineapple theme. But this one is a scrubber for me, and I'm getting a mild headache now. It baffles me how this could be perceived as a dumb reach freshie. And no, it's not similar to Joop! Homme. <br />
<br />
-----<br />
<br />
Later impressions. It seems to be a fragrance that needs some acclimatization. After my nose got used to the chlorine note, it actually appears kind of wearable. It's still probably a fragrance that's not meant to be smelled up close. The sillage is mineralic musky clean and fruity, seems to work in the current summer heat at least. But up close, I still get an impression of a cleaning agent with bleach that's covering up a bluntly sour and weirdly sweet note... Not exactly vomit, but for some reason, this was the first association. It's probably a passing association anyway, but I stand by my claim that this is not a blind buy safe fragrance by today's standards or a good idea for a gift. There are much safer options for conveying this kind of intense freshness. But at least I'm beginning to get the idea behind this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1856345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1856345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-04">06/04/23 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#115 in my "Tour de Fragrance" I like this. I'm used to being disappointed by the weakness of Mont Blanc formulations, but this is going 3+hours, and at this price respraying during the day is not a problem. There's enough powder here to keep the fruitiness from being too much. Combine fresh sheets at the Four Seasons with a fruit basket in the room. It's clean, and crisper than I was expecting. This is a no brainer blind buy, 100% office safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1849049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1849049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1841403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1841403" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1841403ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1841403" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-25">05/25/23 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fantastic dumb-reach fragrance.<br />
It is incredibly clean and inoffensive, imagine fresh sheets with a hint of raspberry and cinnamon.<br />
This will become one of my office fragrances for sure.<br />
<br />
8.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1841403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1841403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1838348" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="justinmartini314"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="justinmartini314" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1838348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1838348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441324">justinmartini314</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-21">05/21/23 05:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even though I wouldn't say this is a masterpiece or even a personal favorite, for some this is still one of my most worn fragrances. I can't explain it but I just find this one to be super wearable, especially for the office. Again, it's not even that impressive of a fragrance, to be honest, but I still reach for it constantly. I don't know why. It's just a nice soft slightly sweet linen-like-smelling fragrance. Easy to wear, easy to like. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1838348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1838348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1836662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1836662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SenselessReviews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SenselessReviews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1836662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1836662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154">SenselessReviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-19">05/19/23 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>How did a common sexually transmitted disease rescue Montblanc's "Individuel" from discontinuation? The story is stranger than fiction! <br />
<br />
Nobody had much faith in "Individuel" upon its 2003 release. Montblanc invested so little in development that even a spellchecker to fix the now-famous "e instead of a" problem was too pricy. It didn't help that Iraqi strongman Saddam Hussein, then on the cusp of war with the US, publicly stated that "Individuel" reminded him of his favorite camel. Though Hussein was sincere, he inadvertently caused Montblanc stock to collapse as already-weak "Individuel" sales plummeted further. <br />
<br />
By 2007, four years after its release, "Individuel" was on life support. Its "musky Mr. Miyagi" vibe, though trendy at the time of release, seemed dated. Montblanc executives had begun to focus on their fledgling line of Steven Seagal date-night fragrances, notably "The World Through Yellow-Colored Glasses." <br />
<br />
A conference call was scheduled to announce the discontinuation of "Individuel." Fate had other plans. <br />
<br />
On the morning of August 4, 2007, Dr. Francois Charbonneau's voice bellowed throughout his Paris laboratory. "I do it! I do it!" he yelled triumphantly. What he had done was a marvel of medical research. Charbonneau had isolated the HSV-2 virus -- better known as genital herpes! <br />
<br />
At 3 pm that afternoon, Charbonneau's beaming face appeared on screens across the globe. As cameras flashed, Charbonneau explained how his research had just changed the world. One reporter caught a whiff of Charbonneau's cologne and tossed the fine doctor a compliment. <br />
<br />
"For those of you who wonder, I wear Individuel by Montblanc," Charbonneau said to laughter. <br />
<br />
"So how's this for a headline: 'Dr. Herpes endorses Individuel'?" teased another reporter. <br />
<br />
Charbonneau's face tightened. His gaze hardened. A hush fell over the room, over the world. <br />
<br />
Finally, Carbonneau looked up from his notes. <br />
<br />
"You know what? I like!" <br />
<br />
The room erupted. So did Montblanc headquarters, where executives exchanged high-fives and shoulder slaps. "Individuel" sold 637 million bottles that day, a record that would not be broken until the 2012 debut of "Gary" by SpongeBob SquarePants. <br />
<br />
"Individuel" continues to benefit from the beloved Dr. Herpes, not to mention a sweetly masculine scent profile. It's one contagion that will actually help your sex life!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1836662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1836662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1833872" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1833872" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeatherCouch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeatherCouch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Sport-14185.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14185.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"title="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1833872ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1833872" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991">LeatherCouch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-15">05/15/23 15:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm on the hunt for classy perfumes, and this is one of them. Smells like the classy man with the white shirt and the sunglasses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1833872"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1833872#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831053" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cholera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747706.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cholera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831053ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831053" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706">Cholera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Laundry detergent with a hint of raspberry, that is pretty much it. It is pleasant but not mindblowing, very safe and versatile but for night outs or dates there are much better alternatives.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1831053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1831053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1829372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1829372" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentinal 1971"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1742027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentinal 1971" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1829372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1829372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027">Scentinal 1971</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-10">05/10/23 06:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful soft sandalwood fragrance very similar to Creed's Original Santal (except it's not really original as this came out first apparently!). Despite being described here as both 'sweet' and 'fruity' and I find neither of these accords to be particularly dominant, in fact I detest most sweet/fruity and gourmand fragrances. Instead I find this to be a soft woodsy fragrance and don't pick up most of the notes listed here, which seem rather too many for what is in fact a rather simple and uncomplicated scent profile. Its simplicity and linearity is its strength, it is very inoffensive and safe whilst also being unique enough to set you apart from the crowd. It certainly smells far more expensive than it is and is refined enough to be worn on a formal occasion as it is relaxed enough to wear day to day. It is also extremely affordable without smelling at all cheap, so that's always a bonus!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1829372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1829372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1826227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1826227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OggiNoggi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579673.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OggiNoggi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1826227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1826227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579673">OggiNoggi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-06">05/06/23 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really don't understand this fragrance. It's nice enough, but it's mostly just sweet cinnamon with a really synthetic edge. It's long lasting but moderate to intimate projecting. It original, but kinda dissapointing considering the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1826227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1826227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It lasts pretty much all day on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1825633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1825633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824377" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nauticus9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nauticus9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347792">Nauticus9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-03">05/03/23 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Montblanc Individuel is sweet, fruity, and youthful. <br />
<br />
When you catch a whiff, it smells like fabric softener with a hint of raspberry. I liked it at first, but over time I disliked how synthetic it was. Its pretty versatile and is something you can just throw on. A good scent, but nothing mindblowing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1824377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1824377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1821884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like sweet raspberry along with the other notes included. I find this very reliable and use it as an after-shower fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1821592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1821592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804486" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dexilio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676898.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dexilio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Intense-41917.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41917.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternity Intense"title="Eternity Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);
