Nice and clean. Smells like laundry detergent and dryer sheet. Easy to wear and fits most occasions. There's definitely some sweetness to it, so stay clear of this one if you are into the ultra masculine type of fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1804486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1804486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andrew_Scents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andrew_Scents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621634">Andrew_Scents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just because Jeremy Fragrance and other youtubers talk about this, does NOT mean it smells good. Why would any man want to smell like laundry detergent? Yes you smell "clean", but you smell so boring and generic. I don't care if Creed has a fragrance similar to this, it does NOT make it good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1804112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1804112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1803545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1803545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tre de Fill"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587275"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tre de Fill" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1803545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1803545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587275">Tre de Fill</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 02:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A pleasant and safe fragrance, with no projection and durability.  The price is low, but this money can be invested in better offers.  Overall rating 6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1803545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1803545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800082" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RECEP TULUMCU"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676032"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676032.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RECEP TULUMCU" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676032">RECEP TULUMCU</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-04">04/04/23 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Individuel by Montblanc is one of the most versatile fragrances in my collection. It's a fragrance that can be worn all year round and for any occasion. The opening notes are fresh and citrusy with a hint of mint, making it perfect for spring and summer. As it dries, it becomes warmer and woody, which makes it perfect for fall and winter.<br />
<br />
One of the reasons why I love this fragrance is because of how well it works in different settings. It's suitable for both casual and formal settings, and it's also suitable for both day and night wear. It's a fragrance that's not too strong, but long-lasting enough to provide a light and pleasant scent throughout the day.<br />
<br />
It's a fragrance that can be worn by anyone, regardless of age or style. Whether you are going to work or out on a date, this fragrance will always make you feel confident and good about yourself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1800082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1800082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1797471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loumari/Porthole-83054.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83054.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Porthole"title="Porthole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1797471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1797471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-31">03/31/23 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Individuel has to be one of my favorite fragrance scent profiles. Such a delicious, juicy, masculine, and versatile cologne! The smell is its strongest characteristics, but it does not project for as long as I'd wish it did (probably lasting for about 1.5h and then it quiets down). An excellent after shower scent to throw around the house or go out basically year-round.<br />
 For the price, this is a great buy! Mont Blanc typically smells over its price, but perform right at it. I'd recommend this to men of every age, and even my 5yo gets a spray or two every now and then.<br />
 You can sure find it cheap (right around $25) at discounters, but anything over $35 becomes a push, especially for the smaller bottles - meaning the 2.5 fl.oz bottle is the go to at that price. Get yourself one!<br />
<br />
Update: I grew so fond of it over the last few weeks that I ended up going through my 50mL bottle (probably had some 30mL already) in maybe two weeks. Heavily over sprayed and got compliments, good performance, but we may be talking about 20-25 sprays per use. Buy this and use it as an all around fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1797471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1797471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1797413" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michael.szzz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1685369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michael.szzz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4193.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Individuel"title="Individuel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1797413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1797413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685369">Michael.szzz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-31">03/31/23 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing smell almost like clean laundry mixed with fruits and spices. Clean, fresh perfect for daily casual wear in spring. Performance could be better lasts for 6-7 hours but doesnt project as well as i was expecting. Overall a solid fragrance and an amzing price, only 26 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1797413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1797413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786920" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fazh97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fazh97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841">Fazh97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 17:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite all the notes you only get raspberry and a light touch of fresh spice. This resembles clothes that have been washed and dried. Although cashmere is not listed, it's the scent profile which this fragrance delivers,  and a pleasant cozy version of it. Clean, professional, a modest amount of sweetness. <br />
<br />
If you're looking for something simple and straightforward with complete versatility, this is worth trying.  If you want something unique and attention grabbing, you might find this boring. <br />
<br />
Performance is a little weak.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1786920"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1786920#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Definitely try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1781907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1781907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1781280" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweetboy05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1702817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweetboy05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dumont/Nitro-Red-73023.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73023.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nitro Red"title="Nitro Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1781280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1781280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817">Sweetboy05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-11">03/11/23 17:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried to like this one, I really did. But in the end, it just ended up smelling like a less screechy version of Joop! Homme. I gave it to my dad. Considering I bought it for only $15, it wasn't a complete waste of money. Just wasn't for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1781280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1781280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1774213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1774213" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trendkill97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trendkill97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Black-Aoud-1142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Aoud"title="Black Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1774213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1774213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278">Trendkill97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-03">03/03/23 15:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nostalgia hits with this one, in a good way, sweet kind of sticky, clean laundry detergent that overall comes off as pleasant, it's white musky synthetic at the base with a touch of fruitiness from raspberry up top, quite linear, lasts for about 4-5 hours. There's a slight plastic type of nuance. All the other notes present have alot going on for sure but aren't differentiated, Jeremy Fragrance definitely boosted up the popularity of this one no arguments about that! In conclusion, slightly cooler temperatures (will get cloying in the heat), in work settings this could work, inoffensive but does have rough edges. If there are memories with this, it's worth repurchasing, a good scent but not a great one. Mont Blanc now are bringing in much more quality scents of late.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1774213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1774213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1773312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TRmen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TRmen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1773312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1773312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334912">TRmen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-02">03/02/23 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is good but very synthetic. If your looking for a clean, soapy fragrance without that synthetic notes then you definitely go Versace The Dreamer. MontBlanc is also nice but it has a very fabric softener vibes in there. Italians are the best when you're looking for a clean fragrance that's why you should go to Versace with the same price (maybe a bit expensive not sure).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1773312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1773312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771860" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Notmyfrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587299"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587299.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Notmyfrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); Definitely cloying as well as having a sickly sweet vibe to it, but if you look past that, its a good fresh fragrance for multiple occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1771860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1771860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1768697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539321">Wichiteka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-24">02/24/23 21:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased this fragrance  based on all the hype around it, I don't like it because after the opening is gone, I  perceive an odor that makes me sick. I don't know if it is the violet note.<br />
<br />
It's an amazing opening, for sure, and I do get the Raspberry and chocolate notes, it reminds me of those cherry filled chocolates....<br />
<br />
it doesn't last on me very long, almost 1-2 hours, and since the only thing I enjoy is the opening , that's fine with me.<br />
<br />
I have tried to like it, I can tolerate it a little bit more now, I had it since Nov, so 4 months, I'm waiting for spring to try it again and see whether I keep it or not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1768697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1768697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MorallyGray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662191"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662191.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MorallyGray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662191">MorallyGray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>That classic fresh, laundry esque smelling spray you're all used to and perhaps even love. Very sweet at the opening, I'd argue a bit too much in some instances. I tend to steer away towards warm humid days as on my skin it becomes overtly cloying. Performance on my skin is average teetering on subpar. Around 4-6 hours<br />
<br />
Like many before me have said, this is just a more mature, less potent form of joop homme that keeps itself reserved behind a smaller scent cloud and more fresh notes. Not for everyone but you can't complain for the price. More a spring scent to me than anything.<br />
<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1766785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1766785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1761581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not going to buy again that's for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1759483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1759483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665129">Angelbeast56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-29">01/29/23 17:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I wear this fragrance I dont have a lot of confidence because it smells very similar to joop homme with is not good I feel this fragrance is everything joop homme should have been its got the cough syrup smell but its very very toned downed I feel if you just were a couple sprays of it just to have a nice fruity warm scent You might actually enjoy this fragrance would I repurchase absolutely not is a bad fragrance not really its decent. Its pretty good I guess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1746919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1746919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1745939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1745939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scrappycakes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1642698.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scrappycakes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1745939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1745939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642698">scrappycakes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-28">01/28/23 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely not my favourite and I dont love it. Its good for what it is, a synthetic (not in a good or bad way), fruity and spicy. The top notes are quite harsh, so if you want to wear it to an event, do it about a couple hours in advance. Projection isnt the best, but if you arent looking for a fragrance that engulfs everyone around you then I recommend this (although Montblanc explorer is a better option IMO). Lasts quite a while, I sprayed it on me at 6pm one night and I woke up the next day at 9am and I could STILL get a good whiff of it. It may not last as king on your skin, but I got 14 hours longevity. Overall, I give this a 7/10. Good for teenagers and a good office/school fragrance.<br />
<br />
Edit: it grew on me and now its one of my favourites. Best Montblanc fragrance by far. <br />
<br />
8.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1745939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1745939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1741615" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samudex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1627487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samudex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ra-ed-Silver-75900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ra'ed Silver"title="Ra'ed Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1741615ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1741615" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487">samudex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-23">01/23/23 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like wild berries fabric softener, I mean like clean clothes.<br />
It's a complex fragrance.<br />
Be careful spraying it, it lasts forever. You may have to take a shower to get rid of the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1741615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1741615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1739424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CoachSutton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CoachSutton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-For-Men-Absolute-25694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley For Men Absolute"title="Bentley For Men Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1739424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1739424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396650">CoachSutton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 22:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just ok to me. I have tried to like this once, but just cannot do so. It really lives up to the description when the first accord listed is sweet. For me it is so sweet that it is sometimes to the point of headache inducing.  Strong note of artificial raspberry that lasts throughout the life of the scent, although it does become a little less prominent in the dry down, allowing the sandalwood to peek through some more. But all this is just my experience; I know many others love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1739424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1739424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738605" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tony_Liberty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455836.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tony_Liberty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455836">Tony_Liberty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 22:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Man I love this. Today I sprayed it in and was wowed. Got sniffs of it throughout the night. Fairly casual imo. Very synthetic but it is meant to be. Reminds me of the raspberry filled chocolates a bit. Maybe a tad dated but still modern and not at all old fashioned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1738605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1738605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1731656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1731656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tacosalad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tacosalad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1731656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1731656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545991">Tacosalad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-11">01/11/23 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not sure how I feel about this one.  Its got me thinking its more for a middle aged man who wants to smell sweet but not in a vibrant sexy way.  Its definitely office friendly because its within a small bubble and doesnt really project far at all but I smell it on my chest under shirt for 10-12 hours. It is pretty unique and would not say it smells just like fabric softener because there is definitely a amber and wet wood in this mixed with the raspberry softener scent.  Cant say I have smelled a similar scent. Perhaps why the name Individual. Gives me Joop vibes as far as the time and trend it follows.  Perhaps dated but still a quality fragrance. Dont think it will get a lot of use from me but for the price a welcome addition I guess. Cool weather friendly, feel like it would announce BO in heat. I can see how many would enjoy but I give it 6 for scent 7 for performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1731656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1731656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1729095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells synthetic. Has an above average longevity but has a weak projection. <br />
Smells like a fabric conditioner. Good for a blind buy. But would not buy it again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1729095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1729095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1726965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Unsure if I had a bad batch but mine smelt quite sharp, as if there was too much alcohol in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1725888"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1725888#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1724424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1724424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MikeRauch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1456260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MikeRauch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1724424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1724424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456260">MikeRauch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-03">01/03/23 17:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this after reading that it was similar to Joop Homme, which was my second ever purchased fragrance. It smells good for what it is. Unfortunately, I tire of it after a while and it becomes headache inducing. For people who like sweet, warm, fruity scents this one is worth a shot. It lasts quite a long time. I would get around 12 hours on skin, and several days on clothing. Definitely better during the colder months. I don't wear mine, but for those who don't get headaches it would be good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1724424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1724424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1723200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341177">Tushar Kanti Mandal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am wearing my Mont Blanc Individuel on 1.1..23 . The temperature  of the early morning is cool. This is the golden hour when Mont Blanc Individuel shines a lot. It need cool temperature to shine.The raspberry notes are prominent. There is a hint of vanilla. The fruits are coming through. The harsh chemical note which comes through in the warm season is not there. I am liking it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1721918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1721918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721460" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I prefer it for colder temperatures so that the chocolate, creamy sandalwood, delicious amber accord and vanilla can thrive against the cold air. Quite a compliment magnet as well, but be forewarned that this bay is quite synthetic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1712538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1712538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1711303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Im almost upset I have it on my shelf lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1710040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1710040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709536" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PierreLouis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PierreLouis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766">PierreLouis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe like me you have noticed the majority of reviewers refer to Individual repeating Father Jeremy's litany ad nauseam: synthetic mess, raspberries, "a hint of fabric softener", smells like Joop. Now like many of you I couldn't test this in any shop so I had to blind buy at the lowest possible price. I have no idea what kind of raspberries these people is used to, but certainly they must be very different from mine. Never in a million years I would think of raspberries smelling MI. Even all the different fabric softeners I bought in my life don't smell like this. And no, it doesn't smell like Joop. For $36 AUD I now know the truth. Unless there are different versions of this fragrance around or they just tell us lies about the references. If there is one thing, about clothes, that can remind you of is the smell you find in laundry shops, the ones making dry cleaning. So clean, or dry cleaned, clothes. Nothing to write home about. It's a perfume that you can completely pass, the positive side is that now that I have it I don't wonder anymore about it. It's in the same family of Le Male, Versace Dreamer and also something of Burberry Touch. The performance of my batch, I assume recent, is mediocre. It is just $36 but I wish I did not buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1709536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1709536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709210" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709210" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="puffinsauce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318980.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="puffinsauce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Odyssey-Homme-64464.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64464.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Odyssey Homme"title="Odyssey Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709210ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709210" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318980">puffinsauce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does it smell clean? Yes! Does it smell sweet? Yes! However, it smells like the taste of raspberries mixed with dish soap. I like the frutiness but I hate the synthetic "clean"-ness. <br />
Again, it's very synthetic. But I guess that's why it's so heavily discounted. <br />
Gives me a headache. I don't mind synthetic-smelling fragrances, but this is just too much for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1709210"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1709210#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707994" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="otteromkram"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="otteromkram" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803">otteromkram</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-12">12/12/22 19:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mont Blanc Legend is the training-wheels version of this.<br />
<br />
Both remind me of walking past a mall-based teen clothier and getting blasted with whatever unredolent cacophony they've conjured up (Abercrombie &amp; Fitch, I'm looking at you).<br />
<br />
It's not bad for what it is, but if you're over the age of 25, I'd suggest trying some adult perfumes on and see how they fit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1707994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1707994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Infevo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1600639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Infevo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600639">Infevo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-12">12/12/22 06:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A synthetic mess which is a permanent nuisance and induces headaches. But it grabs the attention of people around you which is why it may be a good clubbing scent. Still I would stay away from it if you want to have something pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1707573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1707573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1700260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1700260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent of gentleman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1614127.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent of gentleman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Florentine-Iris-16189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florentine Iris"title="Florentine Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1700260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1700260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127">Scent of gentleman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-01">12/01/22 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MB Individuel is a good versatile fragrance for it's price. I wear it to office and anytime I want to smell airy good and fresh without offending anybody.<br />
<br />
Performance wise is excellent, surprisingly. No need to over spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1700260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1700260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1698213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1698213" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jchoi.07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jchoi.07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1698213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1698213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619597">jchoi.07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-29">11/29/22 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly expected better, just by the people who received it on YouTube. <br />
<br />
This is a synthetic overload and if you overspray it is a headache inducer. However, around 2 to 3 sprays moderately should do the job.<br />
<br />
The closest scent I could think of similar to this is fabric softener in a very heavy way. <br />
<br />
During and after the drydown it smells more like spicebomb or a winter spice/chocolate reminiscent type of scent. <br />
<br />
6/10 would not recommend to anyone who doesn't like synthetic fragrances, but for 15 to 20 bucks it's worth it for beginner collectors.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1698213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1698213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1691097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
