It's a safe office fragrance,but don't go overboard because it can become TOO powdery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1691097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1691097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1686731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Halian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1362556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1362556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Halian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1362556">Halian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-12">11/12/22 07:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very safe perfume for all age, gender and ocassion. Quite subtle in terms of projection, almost unnoticeable, but once you get a whiff of its delicate scent, you know for sure it is pleasant and comforting.<br />
<br />
Can easily be mistaken as a cheap cologne or baby powder, but I don't think Mont Blanc Individuel was meant to be a stunning niche perfume anyway, rather just a good reliable clean-feeling freshner. Its plus point would be the inexpensive damage to your pocket.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1686731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1686731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1683423" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1670139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mohamed_1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mohamed_1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1670139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1670139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490937">Mohamed_1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-20">10/20/22 05:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honest review its a good clean fragrance i use it before sleeping to be honest its nice reminds me of my washing detergent dont expect it to be like wow its a good, nice and sweet fragrance but i dont like the drydown overall<br />
Smell 7.6/10<br />
Bottle 6/10<br />
Longevity- 7-9 hours very intimate when it dries down<br />
uniqueness 8/10 you wont smell it anywhere exepct when you are in a cleaning stuff store<br />
Overall 7.8/10<br />
<br />
Edit: <br />
Im starting to appreciate this fragrance the more i wear it, it is really nice not everyone will like for sure but for me i think its lovely because it grew on me alooot when i got i hated it but then now through half of me 75ml bottle i really love it when i shower and wanna smell clean i grab this and spray 2-4 sprays. One thing i like about is that its not that strong which most people complain about it but for me i get the same 7-9 hours with close to the skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1670139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1670139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666749" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Monteeze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584362"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1584362.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Monteeze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584362">Monteeze</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-15">10/15/22 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I reallllly want to love it but it's just not what I was expecting to be honest. It's not bad at all but it just smells like laundry detergent mixed with scented antiperspirant with a hint of berry and a touch of chocolate. <br />
I do like it though, for the price it's a steal.<br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1666749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1666749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659203" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Bois-D-Argent-48396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois D'Argent"title="Bois D'Argent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this side by with Creed Original Santal and I encourage you to do the same. You will smell that they almost identical. <br />
<br />
Scent: The only difference I can discern is when I push my nostril right up to my skin. Original Santal is a little more aromatic. I think original santal uses better herbs and juniper, and individual used raspberry. But I can't tell the difference in the air, only right up close. <br />
<br />
Performance: Longevity is better on the Creed. About 4 hours with the Creed and about 2.5 with mont blanc. They both become a skin scent very quickly. They both have weak performance. <br />
<br />
There's comparisons on YouTube where people can not tell them apart. It's worth noting that this came out before original santal. It's also worth noting that the perfumer is the same here as it is with the Creed; Pierre Bourdon. <br />
<br />
I truly believe this is the same formula but slightly less aromatic, and not quite as strong as the Creed. I love Original Santal, but this is almost identical, and costs 1/10th of the price. <br />
<br />
Scent 8/10<br />
Performance 2.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1659203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1659203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658858" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TripleA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TripleA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nikos/Sculpture-Homme-925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sculpture Homme"title="Sculpture Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583005">TripleA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 10:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, this was love at first sniff. Even though I enjoy the burst of bergamot when you first spray this, I do feel as if by now the note has actually faded quite a bit, as I can't pick it up anymore. It smells fresh on my skin and sweet on my clothes. I like to use this as my signature scent as many people have told me it fits my personality. I've been complimented for this 7 hours into wearing, which is just amazing, as the dry down is a basic sandalwood and vanilla, although the middle notes and the cinnamon are present throughout the entire time you are wearing it. Raspberry is definitely there but fades really quickly. <br />
Love this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1658858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1658858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's an ok scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1652615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1652615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like laundry in a good way. Its a 7 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1652215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1652215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651911" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RLB1979"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1412295.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RLB1979" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit"title="Fahrenheit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412295">RLB1979</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like most on here this was a blind buy for me as well, it does smell like a dryer sheet with some raspberry essence, I did not enjoy this at all, If I want to smell like a dryer sheet I will just wash my clothes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1651911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1651911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651558" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michel Silencieux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michel Silencieux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-Rhythm-18903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit Rhythm"title="Burberry Brit Rhythm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651558ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651558" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564098">Michel Silencieux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-23">09/23/22 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first impression was that this is similar to the pink version of Joop! After the opening it does change significantly though. Its less sweet than Joop!, and less bubblegum like.  To my nose I get a smell of cream and raspberries, in a good way. On my clothes it leaves a fresh clean smell. Some reviews likened it to clothes fresh out of the laundry, and I totally get that as well, but I actually like that smell. I get  moderate wear from this (about 4-5 hours) on my skin and it projects well to a couple of metres. My wife really liked this one on me, probably more than I like it. <br />
<br />
I dont agree with comments that this is a younger guy fragrance. Im in my 50s and feel comfortable with this. I do love Joop!, and thus this fragrance is appealing to me. The dry down is much fresher and lacks the strong sweet vanilla obvious in Joop! and is dominated by the raspberry and sandalwood notes. I feel this is a good fragrance for spring and it smells more like a daytime scent. Not a bad choice for the office in my view. <br />
<br />
Nice style on the bottle, but not the easiest to grip, but it does look good on the shelf. Test before you buy, but I personally do like this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1651558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1651558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1648072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1648072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rip &amp; Run"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1517929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rip &amp; Run" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1648072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1648072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517929">Rip &amp; Run</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-18">09/18/22 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mont Blanc Individuel is pleasant, innocuous, sporty, casual, warm yet fresh, and slightly sweet.  This is an extremely versatile scent that can be found at a great price.  Whether you are just beginning your fragrance journey or have been collecting for years, this is an easy reach that won't disappoint.  In my experience, it performs well year round as well.  It has moderate projection and won't punish you if you happen to over spray.  It's ideal for the office, school, church, gym, casual, and even semi-formal settings.  I very much enjoy the scent profile and believe it will complement any man's collection.  If the note breakdown agrees with your taste, I vehemently recommend giving it a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1648072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1648072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1647352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1647352" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="redwzrd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552274"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="redwzrd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1647352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1647352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552274">redwzrd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-17">09/17/22 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meh.. blind buy, its not horrible but defiantly on the synthetic side. i do smell the dryer sheet thing but has a freshness to it. it would be safe for office wear or if you dont want anything super strong as a daily wear. if i could rate it 1 - 10 id give it a 5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1647352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1647352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="4193" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent895314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc895314" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aaronbdavis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1103849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1103849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aaronbdavis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma895314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd895314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1103849">aaronbdavis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-30">12/30/17 22:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First off let me say that reading through most of these reviews was a little frustrating to me.  It seems a lot of people here are rating MBI based on what they want it to be rather than what it is.  They are wanting an orange, but bite into an apple instead, and then complain that the apple didn't taste more like an orange.  You need to rate a fragrance for what it is.<br />
<br />
I personally am SO glad I bought this and here is why:<br />
<br />
1. Of all my fragrances, this is THE one I feel the most comfortable wearing at work.  Why?  I work in a hospital and sometimes I work with sick people who don't want an "in-your-face unique wonderful fragrance".  This is perfect for a hospital setting because it just smells CLEAN.  Maybe if you work construction or in an office, something else might suit you better, but for my "office" this makes me smell good, clean, and fresh without screaming for attention and making sick people feel more sick.<br />
<br />
2. Yes it does smell very similar to a dryer sheet, but since when is that a bad smell?  I used to love standing outside the house where I could smell the air coming from the dryer because it smelled soo good!  But this is even better than that with a hint of raspberry sweetness to it. Some days I am not in the mood to scream for attention and just want to smell nice.  This is my blind grab.<br />
<br />
3. There is definitely not a "beast-mode" with this stuff but let me tell you, it will not disappoint you with how long it lasts or projects.  Hard to over-spray because when you smell it it is simply a subtle pleasure to your olfactory senses.  It is classy and clean.<br />
<br />
My wife loves it.  What wife doesn't love clean fresh sheets on the bed?  You'll smell like that.  <br />
<br />
For it's purpose, this is a perfect scent.  If you are looking to turn a woman on, get La Nuit d'Lomme.  Just stop complaining that this fragrance isn't something that it was never supposed to be.<br />
<br />
This smells wonderfully pleasant.  Mass pleasing, totally inoffensive, and can be worn pretty well year-round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="895314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=895314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent790847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc790847" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Regular_dude"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1042107.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Regular_dude" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma790847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd790847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042107">Regular_dude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-08">02/08/17 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm getting big laughs of guys here who bought it because it's "Jeremy approved" only to realize that not all girls like it because, guess what: not all girls have the same taste in perfumes !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="790847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=790847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1155743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1155743" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="USS-Spongebob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="USS-Spongebob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Azzaro-Pour-Homme-Night-Time-13965.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13965.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Azzaro Pour Homme Night Time"title="Azzaro Pour Homme Night Time"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1155743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1155743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194398">USS-Spongebob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-16">03/16/20 18:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Things this is not:<br />
<br />
- Groundbreaking<br />
- An artistically stimulating masterpiece<br />
- Worthy of endless hours of discourse and YouTube hype<br />
- A lady-killer panty-dropper date perfume<br />
- A classy suit-and-tie scent for special occasions<br />
<br />
This this definitely is:<br />
<br />
- Cheerful and uplifting<br />
- Light and sweet and a little powdery<br />
- Fresh and clean like laundry from the dryer<br />
- Office friendly (few people would say "go home, you smell like fresh clothes and that's offensive")<br />
- An extremely forgiving dumb-reach fragrance for business casual or jeans and a collared shirt<br />
<br />
To me, whether or not it smells like Creed or Joop! or is overhyped by hucksters on the internet is completely irrelevant compared to the simple question: does it smell good and make me happy when I wear it?  (The answer is yes.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1155743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1155743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1551826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1551826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MTinNC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1493819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MTinNC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Acqua-Essenziale-Blu-24788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Essenziale Blu"title="Acqua Essenziale Blu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1551826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1551826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493819">MTinNC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hello everyone, I am new to this site and new to reviewing fragrances. That being said Montblanc Individual was one of my first blind buys about 2.5 years ago. I had a collection of around 12 scents while in highschool but got rid of them between college and getting married. Reset to late 2019 and I'm looking for more scents after getting Montblanc Legend for Father's day in 2017. For me Montblanc Individual is unique. I can't say if it's ground breaking because I'm limited in what fragrances I have smelled so far but I really enjoy it. It's a bit fruity/sweet but there is something else manly and different about it that I really like. Fragrances are hard to review because they are so dependent on what you like as an individual and what your nose and brain do with a specific scent. I would recommend this for a blind buy. I think it's just different enough to make you remember to use it and it's usually very well priced. I think I got mine for $30 on ebay. <br />
<br />
My opinion is:<br />
<br />
Any season wearable<br />
Sillage is a few feet<br />
Longevity is around 5-7 hours with a few sprays on my neck and a few on my shirt.<br />
Value is good for the price<br />
<br />
This is my first review on here so please don't judge me too hard! Thanks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1551826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1551826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent488239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc488239" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChaoticBliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/780474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.780474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChaoticBliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Paco-Rabanne-Pour-Homme-526.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.526.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"title="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma488239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd488239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/780474">ChaoticBliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-05-22">05/22/14 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great fragrance, although I prefer Presence.  I find it funny when people say this smells like Creed's Original Santal when this came out two years before Original Santal. Shouldn't it be Original Santal smells like Individuel?  Just my two cents worth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="488239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=488239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="4193" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent665731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fugal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/818260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.818260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fugal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/JD-Jeffrey-Dame/JD-Santal-Superbe-52858.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52858.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="JD Santal Superbe"title="JD Santal Superbe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/818260">Fugal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-10">01/10/16 04:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, Individuel has proven to be very much dependant on the weather. When I got it over the summer, it was smooth and woody: mostly sandalwood, lavender, and laundry musk. It was pleasant, but a little too dense for summer wear. <br />
<br />
Now that it is winter, I get a little bit of tang from the raspberry, the warmth and richness of the chocolate and vanilla, and still the smooth sandalwood (the musk is toned down quite a bit). Sometimes I love it, sometimes the freshness and sweetness don't mix well for me. I usually like it but hardly find myself reaching for it. <br />
<br />
I thought, at first, that it would do quite well during autumnnot the case. Some of the other reviewers have mentioned a cloying "screechiness," that is exactly what I get. Its like this fragrance is confused as to which notes should be the strongest. I get hit with a ton of things all at once (including a ton a juniper). It just doesn't smell good on my skin.<br />
<br />
Overall, I think that this is a nice casual scent for cold weather. Longevity is over 8 hours, silage is a little on the low side. The versatility is what really kills this, I practically have to find special times to wear it. Even though its cheap, this might not be the best blind buy unless you're into sweet, fruity scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="665731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=665731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent443931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc443931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brandon_4078"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/406124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.406124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brandon_4078" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Rodriguez-for-Him-1063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Rodriguez for Him"title="Narciso Rodriguez for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma443931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd443931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/406124">Brandon_4078</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-01-07">01/07/14 21:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased a sample of this and let me say this: this is a very high quality, long lasting, heavy silage, fresh, clean fragrance.  It definately has a clean-clothes/laundry-detergent/dryer-sheet typ smell IMO.<br />
<br />
I really wanted to like this one but the chocolate and raspberry peak through quite often.  I never liked chocolate with fruit (both taste and smell), and then when you add in the clean-clothes/laundry-detergent/dryer-sheet smell, my nose just doesn't like it.  It unfortunately nauseates me.  <br />
<br />
I am jealous of the people who can stand it because it is so versatile, high quality, good performing, and cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="443931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=443931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent788630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc788630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J.Gilmore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727184.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="J.Gilmore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma788630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd788630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727184">J.Gilmore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-02">02/02/17 21:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My wife won't touch me when I wear this fragrance the only reason I bought this fragrance like many others did was because it was 100% approved by Jeremy fragrance. I'm not saying it's bad it just smells really powdery almost like Snuggles the bear gave me a hug and wouldn't let me go. Lol! For those that don't know Snuggles is a fabric softener I personally have never met a girl along with my wife that finds this sexy or masculine although when I'm wearing it in the cold it can smell pretty nice to me but like I've said before this is one of those frags that men like and want women to like as well but I'm sorry it ain't happening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="788630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=788630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent878602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc878602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ansarit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ansarit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma878602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd878602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096601">Ansarit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-08">11/08/17 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alright so after all the hype that Jeremy gave this fragrance I decided to trust Jeremys opinion and blindly buy a 1.7oz bottle of this from notino. Finally after a week of waiting for my shipment ,my mbi finally arrived and I couldnt wait any longer I just wanted to smell it right away!!!! So I open the box and take off the cap and spray only 1 spray on my wrist . I take a deep strong sniff and man I was beyond disappointed. Smelled like a cheap bottle of febreze. I thought to myself maybe the dry down will turn into some kind of chick magnet aroma so I waited a couple hours and took another deep sniff and yet again,,, the same cheap synthetic fabric softener scent . Boyyy was I pissed off at Jeremy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="878602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=878602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1342883" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1342883" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="B_Lindz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1299734"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1299734.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="B_Lindz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1342883ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1342883" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1299734">B_Lindz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-13">05/13/21 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You may have heard people say that this cologne smells like a raspberry drier sheet. I'm not really smelling raspberry, but this, without a doubt, smells like a dryer sheet to me. It doesn't smell like clean laundry; it smells like a drier sheet. Like, open a box of drier sheets, stick your nose in the box and that is this cologne. You get that clean, chemical smell. It isn't bad; it's actually quite good, but it is meant for an older audience; I'd say 35+. I'm just going to hold on to this one until it smells like it fits me, but for now I just like it/it's okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4193"comment_id="1342883"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Montblanc/Individuel-4193.html?ccid=1342883#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="4193" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">58.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Zoologist-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Zoologist Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
